Label.fr: Quoi qu'il en soit...revenons aux affaires...

Label.en: All merchants were legally required to sell at this market three times per week!
Label.fr: Les marchands parisiens devaient obligatoirement vendre leurs produits au marché trois fois par semaine !
Label.es: All merchants were legally required to sell at this market three times per week!
Label.zh: All merchants were legally required to sell at this market three times per week!

Label.en: it was a measure against hoarding, price speculation and fraud... as well as allowing for quality control!
Label.fr: Pour éviter le stockage à but spéculatif, la fraude, permettre le contrôle qualité, et celui des poids et mesures !
Label.es: it was a measure against hoarding, price speculation and fraud... as well as allowing for quality control!
Label.zh: it was a measure against hoarding, price speculation and fraud... as well as allowing for quality control!
